Secure in-app messaging that allows customers to chat with agents, photo-sharing and obtain conversation history
Updated Service status card design when services are unknown.
Added a show/hide feature for the password field.
Added “Contact Us” to the main menu.

Data Usage - added a link that will allow you to purchase additional data to avoid overage charges
TV Listings - Updated channel names for TV listings that do not have channel logos/icons

Replaced YouTube option with Customer Forums in Contact Us

- Improvement: Added new supported modems so more users can monitor and manage their Internet connection.
- Improvement: Now in Settings -> Dashboard Configuration, Cox Voice users can toggle on/off the Voice Everywhere App card on the home screen.
- Improvement: Have app feedback? You can now share screen grabs! Go to Contact Us -> Email Us to share your thoughts and pictures—we’d love to hear from you!
- Update: Removed an unsupported feature to set start/stop times for DVR recordings. Please use your Cox remote and receiver to adjust start/stop times.

- Improvement: Added new supported modems so more users can monitor and manage their Internet connection.

- Improvement: Have app feedback? You can now share screen grabs! Go to Contact Us -> Email Us to share your thoughts and pictures—we’d love to hear from you!
- Update: Removed an unsupported feature to set start/stop times for DVR recordings. Please use your Cox remote and receiver to adjust start/stop times.

- Update: Removed an unsupported feature to set start/stop times for DVR recordings. Please use your Cox remote and receiver to adjust start/stop times.

Enhancements: Improvements for users with vision impairments including app compatibility with large font sizes, menu color coding and text formatting, screen reader focus on visible and selected items, reading card headers aloud, and reading menu items aloud in logical order
Update: Store Locator and WiFi Hotspot cards aren’t shown on your home screen by default (enable these under Settings > Dashboard Configuration)
Fix: Table headers now show in Support articles

Enhancement: Improvements for users with vision/hearing impairments. Includes sufficient color contrast for text and images, enabled voiceover for main menu items, navigation, images, buttons and symbols.
Enhancement: Updated verbiage and icons on Contact Us screen to better route customer feedback
Fix: Updated date format format to MM-DD-YYYY for TV Listings
Fix: Correcting missed call and voicemail counts on dashboard icon
Fix: Now displaying username in dashboard greeting

Enhancement: New Icon and colors
Enhancement: Users can now click on their Name/Email to access and update their account details
Update: Service Status will now display last known status and no longer report on unknown issues
Fix: Support Articles will now allow you to click on links to other support articles and reset tools without being directed out of the application
Update: Accessibility fixes for voice over controls throughout the app
Update: Messenger SDK Updates for reliability

Introducing the all-new Cox app! The Cox Mobile team listened to feedback and has created a rebuilt app experience that is faster, more stable and easier to use than ever.

The new version lets you easily
○ Message a Cox agent 24/7
○ Get support for your services and equipment
○ Manage and pay your bill now seamlessly within the app
○ View your service details
○ Access Cox's product apps to get the most of your services

New Feature: Historical data usage and usage for multiple modems
New Feature: Reset link for modem and set top boxes.
New Feature: Capability to enable/disable Face ID/Touch authentication in app settings.
New Feature: Accessibility Support number will allow customers with disabilities noted on their account to directly connect with agents
New Feature: Payment alert for overdue customers.
Enhancement: Billing updates for payment restrictions.
Enhancement: In-app Messenger updated to the latest SDK.

New: Users can now view and cancel their open service appointments natively or reschedule via an agent.
New: Pull to refresh functionality available on various screens so users can refresh data whenever needed.
Enhancement: Redirect for users without Cox Internet to add services when attempting to use the data usage widget.
Enhancement: Enabled additional in-app deep-links to keep users within the Cox app experience.
Fix: "Agree and Enroll" button no longer freezes when setting up Easy-Pay.
Fix: Device home screen no longer displays duplicate data usage widgets.
